tool_description: Extracts relevant text samples from historical corpora and literary sources to provide authentic usage examples of words across different time periods.

target_word.description: Word to find usage examples for

time_period.description: Historical period for text extraction (e.g., 'Middle English', '18th century')

corpus_types.description: Types of texts to include: literary, legal, religious, scientific, commercial

sample_size.description: Number of text samples to extract (5-100)

context_length.description: Words of context around target word (10-200)

include_metadata.description: Include source metadata (author, date, work title)

error_messages: No corpus data available: No texts found for the specified time period and corpus types.
Invalid sample size: Sample size must be between 5 and 100.
Invalid context length: Context length must be between 10 and 200 words.
Unsupported corpus type: Use valid corpus types: literary, legal, religious, scientific, commercial.
Word not found in period: The target word does not appear in available texts for the specified time period.
usage: Specify the target word and time period, optionally configure corpus types, sample size, context length, and metadata inclusion. Returns authentic historical usage examples with source information.

text_samples.description: Array of text excerpts containing the target word

source_metadata.description: Source information for each text sample

period_coverage.description: Assessment of how well the samples represent the time period
